statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:KinesisDataStream) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:KinesisVideoStream) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
